content: this square is compatible with block a month selected squares in that it should measure 12 inches if worked in worsted weight yarn and has a stitch count of 39 sts per side i have used yarnsmiths create dk in a pink berry b sand c petal pink and d canary yellow rivenhall is a small village in central essex best know for being a service stop on the busy main road through the county less well known are the regular get togethers of the essex lacemakers which happen in the local community hall this pdf download is safe to use and free from viruses it has no embedded links if you need to contact me regarding this pattern you can do so via my user profile here on ravelry
